subject: Stadiums and Arenas
High Net Worth Individuals
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mikhail Prokhorov, one of the richest men in Russia and an avid sports fan, is said to be the leading contender to buy a majority stake in the team and in the planned arena in Brooklyn.
